Celebrate a graceful evening with
a glass of Perrier-Jouët
Dear {{lead.First Name}},
Perrier-Jouët is proud to invite you to a personal viewing of the exhibition The Art & Science of Gems before the magical Superstars of Ballet show
at Marina Bay Sands Theatre.
Before the amazing journey into the most renowned French Ballets in the world, indulge your senses with a glass of Perrier-Jouët Grand Brut and the beautiful pieces of art created by the legendary French High Jewellery House Maison, Van Cleef & Arpels <[[http://www.marinabaysands.com/museum/van-cleef-and-arpels.html]]>.
Please download your personal invitation here <[[http://marketing.pernod-ricard-asia.com/rs/398-RDG-552/images/Invitation to Cocktail Hour.pdf]]>.
Blandine Cochard, Ambassador for Perrier-Jouët in Singapore, will welcome you personally at the reception. Please contact her at +65 8590 1508.
